H0.text: what countries included in the uk. England

H1.text: what countries included in the uk. Scotland

H2.text: what countries included in the uk. Northern Ireland

H3.text: what countries included in the uk. Wales

A4.text: It comprises England, Scotland, Wales and Northern Ireland.

A5.text: Wales accounts for less than 9 per cent of the UK, covering 8,020 square miles (20,779 km2).

A6.text: England, comprising the majority of the population and area of the United Kingdom, does not have its own devolved government, and remains fully the responsibility of the United Kingdom Parliament centralised in London.

A7.text: Northern Ireland, in contrast, is described as a 'province' in the same lists.
